mapper.select: SELECT T2.ID , T2.DISC , T2.TOTALDISCS , T2.TRACK , T2.TOTALTRACKS , T2."YEAR" , T2.ALBUM , T2.CONTENTGROUP , T2.TITLE , T2.ALBUMARTIST , T2.ARTIST , T2.PUBLISHER , T2.GENRE , T2.MEDIATYPE FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(T1 BDKQPR03_PK) */ ROWNUM RN , T1.* FROM (SELECT * FROM DEV.MUSIC_TAG ) T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{_skiprows} + #{_pagesize} ) T2 WHERE T2.RN > #{_skiprows}

SELECT ID , DISC , TOTALDISCS , TRACK , TOTALTRACKS , "YEAR" , ALBUM , CONTENTGROUP , TITLE , ALBUMARTIST , ARTIST , PUBLISHER , GENRE , MEDIATYPE , CREATE_USER , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_TIME FROM DEV.MUSIC_TAG WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID = #{id}
SELECT /*+ INDEX_FFS(T1 BDKQPR03_PK) */ count(*) COUNT FROM DEV.MUSIC_TAG_COPY T1
mapper.update: UPDATE DEV.MUSIC_TAG_COPY SET UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser} , UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DEV.MUSIC_TAG_COPY WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID = #{id}
